name: Spirit of the Dungeon
description:
You are a spirit. Humans worship you, but monsters despise you.

Your duty is to protect the humans from those flesh-eating monsters, poison is your only weapon, but it also has the power to send you back to the spirit realm.

In these platformer-RPG mashup puzzle game you have to kill all the monsters and save the humans in 10 different levels, can you solve them all?

Controls:

  • Move: A-D / Left-Right arrow keys
  • Jump: Space
  • Toggle Inner Light: L
  • Pause: P / Esc
  • Restart: R

Submission to Miz Jam 1

Menu song by KiluaBoy
